mapper.insert: insert into j2ee.order(item_id, merchandise_id, machine_id, o_price, o_num, date) values (#{o.oId},#{o.merchandiseId},#{o.machineId},#{o.oPrice},#{o.oNum},#{o.date})
mapper.select: select o_id, item_id, merchandise_id, machine_id, o_price, o_num, date as Date from j2ee.order;

select merchandise.merchandise_id, merchandise.name, SUM(order.o_price) as sump from merchandise JOIN j2ee.order on merchandise.merchandise_id = order.machine_id GROUP BY merchandise.merchandise_id ORDER BY sump DESC
